description: This seminar explores the role of music in film and television through study of the composerâ€™s process, business and legal fundamentals, professional expectations, production technology, relevant history, and analysis of classic and influential film scores. The class is designed as an up-to-date and real-world overview of the medium and professional industry, focusing on its dual nature as both an art form and a business. Background in music or video, with an ability to read music suggested.
title: Composing for Film & Media: Ar...
long_title: Composing for Film & Media: Art, Innovation, and Commerce
